mapper.sql: aid, title, description, context, type, mgrade, count, startdate, enddate, gid, state, createdate, editdate, eid
mapper.insert: insert into active (aid, title, description, context, type, mgrade, count, startdate, enddate, gid, state, createdate, editdate, eid) values (#{aid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{context,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mgrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eid,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update active
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
context = #{context,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mgrade = #{mgrade,jdbcType=INTEGER},

state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createdate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
editdate = #{editdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
eid = #{eid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where aid = #{aid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
